Verses: 1 idho, Karththar Dhesaththai Verumaiyum Paazhumaakki, Adhaik Kavizhththu Adhin Kudigalai Sidharadippaar.

2 appozhudhu, Janaththukku Eppadiyo Appadiye Aasaariyanukkum, Velaikkaaranukku Eppadiyo Appadiye Ejamaanukkum, Velaikkaarikku Eppadiyo Appadiye Ejamaanikkum, Kondavanukku Eppadiyo Appadiye Vitravanukkum, Kadan Koduththavanukku Eppadiyo Appadiye Kadanvaanginavanukkum, Vattivaanginavanukku Eppadiyo Appadiye Vattikoduththavanukkum, Ellaarukkum Sariyaaga Nadakkum.
3 dhesam Muzhudhum Kollaiyaagi Mutrilum Verumaiyaagum; Idhu Karththar Sonna Vaarththai.
4 dhesam Pulambi Vaadum; Boomi Saththuvamatru Ularndhupogum; Dhesaththu Janaththile Uyarndhavargal Thavippaargal.
5 dhesam Than Kudigalin Moolamaai Theettuppattadhu; Avargal Nyaayappramaanangalai Meeri, Kattalaiyai Maarupaadaakki, Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyai Muriththaargal.
6 idhinimiththam Saabam Dhesaththai Patchiththadhu, Adhin Kudigal Dhandikkappattaargal; Dhesaththaar Thagikkappattaargal, Silarmaaththiram Meendhirukkiraargal.
7 dhraatcharasam Dhukkankondaadum, Dhraatchachchedi Vadhangum; Manakkalippaayirundhavargal Ellaarum Perumoochchu Viduvaargal.
8 melangalin Sandhosham Oyum, Kalikoorugiravargalin Sandhadi Ozhiyum, Veenaiyin Kalippu Nindrupom.
9 paadalode Dhraatcharasam Kudiyaargal; Madhubaanam Adhaik Kudikkiravargalukkuk Kasakkum.
10 verumaiyaaippona Nagaram Thagarndhu, Oruvarum Ulle Pravesikkak Koodaadhapadi, Veedugalellaam Adaipattukkidakkum.
11 dhraatcharasaththukkaaga Veedhigalile Kookkural Undu; Ellaa Sandhoshamum Mangi, Dhesaththin Magizhchchi Atruppom.
12 nagaraththil Meedhiyaayiruppadhu Azhive; Vaasalgal Idikkappattup Paazhaaik Kidakkum.
13 olivamaraththai Ulukkumpodhum, Dhraatchappazhangalai Aruththuth Theerumpodhum, Pinparippukkuk Konjam Meendhiruppadhupola Dhesaththukkullum Indha Janangalin Naduvilum Konjam Meendhirukkum.
14 avargal Saththamittu Gembeerippaargal; Karththarudaiya Magaththuvaththinimiththam Samuththiraththinindru Aarpparippaargal.
15 aagaiyaal Karththarai, Velukkunthisaiyilum, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Naamaththai Samuththirath Theevugalilum Magimaippaduththungal.

16 needhiparanukku Magimai Endru Paadum Keedhangalai Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharaththilirundhu Ketkirom; Naano, Ilaiththupponen Ilaiththupponen; Enakku Aiyo! Dhrogigal Dhrogampannugiraargal; Dhrogigal Migudhiyaai Dhrogampannugiraargal Engiren.
17 dhesaththuk Kudigale, Thigilum, Padukuzhiyum, Kanniyum Ungalukku Neridum.

18 appozhudhu, Thigilin Saththaththirku Vilagi Odugiravan Padukuzhiyil Vizhuvaan; Padukuzhiyilirundhu Erugiravan Kanniyil Adappaduvaan; Uyara Irukkum Madhagugal Thiravundu, Boomiyin Asthibaarangal Kulungum,
19 dhesam Norungave Norungum, Dhesam Muriyave Muriyum, Dhesam Asaiyave Asaiyum.
20 veriththavanaippola Dhesam Thallaadi, Oru Kudilaippolap Peyarththuppodappadum; Adhin Paadhagam Adhinmel Baaramaayirukkaiyaal, Adhu Vizhundhupom, Ini Ezhundhiraadhu.
21 akkaalaththil Karththar Unnadhamaana Senaiyai Unnadhaththilum, Boomiyin Raajaakkalai Boomiyilum Visaarippaar.
22 avargal Kebiyil Egamaaik Kattundavargalaaga Serndhu Kaavalil Adaikkappattu, Aneganaal Sendrapinbu Visaarikkappaduvaargal.
23 appozhudhu Senaigalin Karththar Seeyon Malaiyilum Erusalemilum Aalugaiseyvadhaal, Sandhiran Kalangum, Sooriyan Naanamadaiyum; Avarudaiya Mooppargalukku Munbaaga Magimai Undaayirukkum.
